id,
condition_name,
condition_content,

field_type,

status,

mapper.update:
update condition_info
condition_name = #{conditionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
condition_content = #{conditionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param_type = #{paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_type = #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update condition_info set condition_name = #{conditionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, condition_content = #{conditionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_type = #{paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_type = #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from condition_info where condition_name=#{name} and status = 1 ;
